name: Super Luigi 8 Bit 2D (SM64 Demake)
description:
Use arrow to move

Use Enter to Press Start at the Title Screen

Use Z to interact 

Use N to Jump (in Battlefield Level)

Use X to Hit someone (in Battlefield Level)

-----------------------------------------------------------

A demake of the SM64 Game.

Luigi instead Mario.

Inspired by this first project :

https://therurik.itch.io/papermario6dot4

Made with Paint and GB Studio 2.0
